strings.Value: [Attack] "What a disgusting offer. You will be brought to justice."

{n}Morhalan looks at you apprehensively, but his voice sounds confident.{/n} "Greetings, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}. I can see that my humble efforts to escape your observant royal gaze seem to have miserably failed! Well that'll be all right, it remains for me to make you an offer that you will find hard to resist!"

"The very same thing that I offer all the other over-meticulous hunters and prying guards. Gold. Gold, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}. All that I've managed to save and scrape up over my life. Rest assured, it's a very substantial amount. You wouldn't reject an offer like this just because some naive spring chicken decided they want to play justice!"

"I'm happy to hear that you have found my offer sensible. Please accept this purse of gold. Your people can collect the rest from my workshop. Now if you will excuse me, there is one more matter that I simply must address before I leave these lands."
